duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a clean, safe, and attractive environment in the Medical Center, including patient rooms, ancillary areas, and common areas.
Incorporate guest relation skills in all daily activities.
Demonstrate commitment to the values and standards of behaviors at UnityPoint Health.
Adhere to policies, procedures, and safety guidelines in the workplace.
Maintain current licenses and certifications required for the position.

education_certification.credential: Reading, writing, and mathematical skills at a level normally acquired through completion of high school or equivalent preferred.
Valid driver’s license when driving any vehicle for work-related reasons.
